text: Jack's Big Music Show is a children's musical TV show on Noggin. The show involves a guitarist named Jack, his best friend Mary, and their pet dog Mel. They're all puppets. Each of the characters play music together, as well as music guests who are willing to join in. A singing group called the Schwartzman Quartet also appears in various episodes. == Main characters == * Jack: The main character. * Mary: Jack's partner, best friend and love interest. * Mel: Jack's pet dog. * The Schwartzman Quartet: A look-alike singing group. Category:American children's television series Category:English-language television programs Category:2005 television series debuts Category:2007 television series endings
title: Jack's Big Music Show
